name: Ynet - Bigger Text

user.name: LL25255252
user.about: I sometimes forget to check my userstyles RSS so if you want to report a problem send me a private message instead of starting a new discussion/review/question.

css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document 
 url-prefix(http://www.ynet.co.il/articles)
,url-prefix(https://www.ynet.co.il/articles)
 {

/* only for the "main" text */ 
span, /* */
body999, /* */
td, /* */
li, /* */
p,font,blockquote
,div.posttext,div.post-body,div.PostDescription
,div.content,div#article,div.ArticleText
,div.post_body
,div.body
,div.t
,div.n
,div.blogText
,div.copy
,div.comments
,div.dsq-comment-message
,div#q_answer
,div#articlebody
,div.quote
,div.katava-box
,dd
,div.comment
,div.text
,div.art_tkb_talkback_content /* ynet comments */
{
font-size: large!important ; /* */
font-family: arial, sans-serif !important; /* */
line-height: 150% !important ; /* line spacing - medium */
}

span.spacer,ul#script-nav,div#navbox{font-size:small!important}
input{font-size:8pt!important}

textarea
{font-size:8pt!important;
line-height: normal !important ; /* line spacing - medium */
}
}
